titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation against fighting of duells
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christoper Barker, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at Our Court at Whitehall the Thirteenth day of August in the Twelfth Year of Our Reign, 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
